name: Brain
definition: The primary organ of the central nervous system. Center for thinking, memory, and control.

name: Heart
definition: The vital muscular organ that pumps blood throughout the body.

name: Liver
definition: The largest internal organ. Detoxifies the body and manages metabolism.

name: Lung
definition: The main organ of the respiratory system. Facilitates oxygen intake and CO2 excretion.

name: Stomach
definition: One of the main organs of the digestive system. Breaks down food.

name: Kidney
definition: Filters blood to remove waste products and excess water as urine.
